p: Using the Soxhlet extraction method, the oil content of Camellia oleifera fruit, which was a light yellow liquid at room temperature, was determined to be 21.54%. The results of the analysis of the fatty acid composition of camellia oil by GC-MS (Figure 2) show that the highest fatty acid proportion consisted of oleic acid (76.91±0.33%), followed by palmitic acid (10.33±0.08%), linoleic acid (9.08±0.34%), and finally stearic acid (0.51±0.08%).
